log.title: Daily Log
log.ai_fill_tip: Leave nutrition fields blank to auto-fill with AI

ai.title: AI Assistant
ai.not_configured_desc: Please enter your Google Gemini API Key in the Settings page to enable this feature.
ai.welcome: Hello! How can I help you?
ai.example_prompt: e.g., "Give me some low-calorie lunch ideas."
ai.new_chat_confirm_desc: This will clear your current conversation history. This action cannot be undone.
ai.new_chat_confirm: Are you sure you want to start a new chat? This will clear the current conversation.

settings.title: Settings
settings.ai_settings_desc: Configure your AI assistant. The API key is stored securely on your device.
settings.api_key_required_error: API Key is not set. Please add it in Settings.

user_profile.title: User Profile
user_profile.desc: Provide your details to calculate a more accurate daily calorie goal (TDEE).

activity.very_active: Very active (very hard exercise & physical job)

user_profile.validation_error: Please fill in all profile fields to calculate your goal.
user_profile.tdee_result_1: Your estimated daily calorie need is
user_profile.tdee_result_2: Your daily goal has been updated.

macronutrient_goals.title: Macronutrient Goals
macronutrient_goals.desc: Set your daily goals for protein, carbs, and fat in grams.

data_management.title: Data Management
data_management.desc: Export your data for backup, or import it on a new device.
data_management.import_confirm: Are you sure you want to import data? This will overwrite all current data.
data_management.import_success: Data imported successfully! The app will now reload.
data_management.import_error: Failed to import data. The file may be corrupt or in the wrong format.

app_update.title: App Update
app_update.desc: Check for new versions of the application. If an update is found, the app will reload automatically.

camera.scan_error: Could not analyze image. Please try again.
camera.unidentified: Food not identified. Please enter manually.
camera.permission_error: Camera permission is required. Please enable it in your browser settings.
